item.title: Baking Sourdough Bread
item.description: My first attempt baking sourdough bread led to tasty, but flat loaves. Here’s why.

item.title: COVID-19
item.description: The impacts of COVID-19 are really not upon us yet. But some of them are hitting, and I thought I’d jot some notes about how it’s hitting us here in SF.

item.title: Updated Management README
item.description: I updated my “Management README”. Give it a read if you’d like.

item.title: Engineering Leadership 321
item.description: I’ve come to firmly believe that Engineering Leadership has a 3-2-1 principle to create Engineer happiness, which is a key prerequisite for high performance Engineering teams.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: I’ve been procrastinating setting up a real blog for… well, years. Now it’s here. Read on for the why and the how.
